<h1 align="center">
  Gelato Mio
</h1>

Gelato Mio is a template landing page built for cake/bakery stores. I used [GatsbyJS](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) on the frontend and for content management I went with [Sanity](https://www.sanity.io/).

- GatsbyJS
- GraphQL
- styled-components
- Sanity
- Netlify
- VS Code
